content:
Create Your Intraday Management Dashboard

After you build your Intraday Management dashboard, you refresh it each morning for the current business day’s data.

Workforce Engagement is available in Lightning Experience, Enterprise, Performance, and Unlimited Editions. User permissions are needed to view, create, and edit workload histories, intelligent forecasts, capacity plans, shifts, and shift segments.

To create your dashboard:

From the App Launcher, find and select Intraday Management.
Click Let’s Go.
Select a capacity plan that meets these criteria:
The plan is built in an Omni-Channel queue-based routing workflow.
The plan is short term.
The plan must contain data that covers at least the next 24 hours.
Save your changes.

At the start of each business day, click refresh to get today's information. You can change the capacity plan at any time.

Alternatively:

From the App Launcher, find and select Intraday Management.
Click Let’s Go.
Select No Plan in the Capacity Plan dropdown menu.
Select a service territory.
Save your changes.
At the start of each business day, click refresh to get today's information. You can change the service territory at any time.

Filter the dashboard by job profile or time.
title: Setting Up and Managing Intraday Workforce with Service Cloud
